# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.1.0] - 2025-12-17

### Added
- Initial release of trust-score-agent
- `TrustScoreClient` for library usage
- URL analysis with Claude AI and MCP tools
- FastAPI server with REST API endpoint
- Trust score calculation with detailed factors
- Support for single and batch URL analysis
- Command-line interface via `trust-score-server`
- Comprehensive documentation and examples
- Type hints and py.typed marker for type checking support

### Features
- Async/await support for high performance
- HTTPS detection
- Suspicious keyword scanning
- Domain characteristic analysis
- Detailed trust factors and explanations
- Configurable API key management

[0.1.0]: https://github.com/yourusername/trust-score-agent/releases/tag/v0.1.0
